thread.title: Team Sideline heads to Bolles vs. Columbia for our Week 7 GOTW
thread.title_full: Team Sideline heads to Bolles vs. Columbia for our Week 7 GOTW

title: Team Sideline heads to Bolles vs. Columbia for our Week 7 GOTW
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Team Sideline heads to Bolles vs. Columbia for our Week 7 GOTW We're half way through the Sideline 2015 season so what better way to bring in the midway by bring our Game of the Week to Bolles as the Bulldogs play host to the Columbia Lake City Wolverines. This game features two of the best teams in the area, who boast a combines 10-1 record, with two top-five area-offenses as well. In addition, it features a great coaching match up in former Florida State Seminole, Brian Allen, and coaching Hall of Famer, Corky Rogers. It promises to be one of our best GOTW's of the season. This game features two of the best teams in the area, who boast a combines 10-1 record, with two top-five area-offenses as well. In addition, it features a great coaching match up in former Florida State Seminole, Brian Allen, and coaching Hall of Famer, Corky Rogers. It promises to be one of our best GOTW's of the season.  //fcnews.tv/1Rx3Ytn   Join the Conversation To   Team Sideline heads to Bolles vs. Columbia for our Week 7 GOTW Tim Bee, sports reporter 12:03 a.m. EDT October 9, 2015 Sideline 2015 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
We're half way through the Sideline 2015 season so what better way to bring in the midway by bring our Game of the Week to Bolles as the Bulldogs play host to the Columbia Lake City Wolverines. This game features two of the best teams in the area, who boast a combines 10-1 record, with two top-five area-offenses as well. In addition, it features a great coaching match up in former Florida State Seminole, Brian Allen, and coaching Hall of Famer, Corky Rogers. It promises to be one of our best GOTW's of the season. 
As if that game wasn't enough, Team Sideline will also have our cameras all around the First Coast so you don't miss any of the Week 7 action. Don't forget to tune into First Coast News at 11:15 for Sideline 2015 to catch all of the highlights.
